# Hacker Claims to Have Stolen Files Belonging to Prominent Law Firm Jones Day

**[wsj.com/articles/hacker-claims-to-have-stolen-files-belonging-to-prominent-law-firm-jones-day-11613514532](https://www.wsj.com/articles/hacker-claims-to-have-stolen-files-belonging-to-prominent-law-firm-jones-day-11613514532)**

February 16, 2021


-----

The law firm of Jones Day in Washington, D.C.Photo: andrew kelly/Reuters
By [Tawnell D. Hobbs](https://www.wsj.com/news/author/tawnell-d-hobbs)

[and Sara Randazzo](https://www.wsj.com/news/author/sara-randazzo)

Updated Feb. 16, 2021 6:45 pm ET

A hacker claims to have stolen files belonging to the global law firm Jones Day and posted
many of them on the dark web.

[Jones Day has many prominent clients, including former President Donald Trump and major](https://www.wsj.com/topics/person/donald-trump)
corporations.
